name: Glassharbor
role_in_state: Primary reagent transshipment and specialized glassworks supporting navigation
economy_niches: Salt-tempered glass production (beacons, bottles, lens blanks)
Ship outfitting and repair (glass fittings, lanterns, balustrades)
Reagent transshipment and bonded storage for ritual suppliers
culture_adjustments: Port cant inflected with technical glassmaking vocabulary
Guild-controlled apprenticeships limit clan-led cooperative labor
Augury rituals incorporate glass-beacon reading before departures
Practical literacy skewed toward technical manuals and account ledgers
constraints: Dependence on imported reagents and bonded storage
Guild monopolies restrict new glassmakers and reagent traders
notes: Glass beacons used in seasonal auguries and navigation
Harbor infrastructure doubles as bonded reagent warehouses
